channel.title: Forum Help Please?
channel.description:
I noticed the news bar at the index of the forum.. And I want to know how to make it appear on my SMF Forum.. I've done it before, but I cannot remember how..
If you don't know what I'm talking about, this is what I'm talking about:
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2lntnvp.jpg[/img]
Can someone tell me how to do it? It's sorta been a long time since I've messed around with SMF..

item.title: Forum Help Please?
item.description:
@11165 wrote:

enable the fucking news panel snorlax

Read full topic
